history.proof: intros H. qsimpl time: 1 use: arrow_relim. qsimpl time: 1 use: arrow_relim,arrow_rintro. qsimpl time: 1 use: RElim,arrow_relim,arrow_rintro. qsimpl time: 1 use: RElim,arrow_relim,arrow_rintro,subrel_impl_relim. qsimpl time: 1 use: RElim,arrow_relim,arrow_rintro,subrel_impl_relim. qsimpl time: 1 use: RElim,arrow_relim,arrow_rintro,subrel_impl_relim. qsimpl time: 1 use: RElim,arrow_relim,arrow_rintro,subrel_impl_relim. hauto unfold: RElim, arrow_pointwise_rel.

original: intros H. apply arrow_relim. apply arrow_rintro. intros a b H0. apply RElim. apply subrel_impl_relim. intros. destruct H1. apply H. - apply H0. - auto. auto.
